course.subject: ISOM
course.name: Integrated Planning and Execution
course.description: This course will use an integrated simulation game as a major learning tool to illustrate how strategic and operational decisions should be made in a competitive business environment. Students will learn to integrate and align key decisions in different business functions to simultaneously achieve a set of defined performance objectives of a company by evaluating decision alternatives and tradeoffs as well as optimizing the resource utilization.

reviews.author: Yayx14
reviews.title: Unexpectedly good grade course
reviews.comment_content:
MBS game occupied most of the class time.
Begin from the second half of the courses, the class time is used for group presentation.
So actually the teaching content only have 4 powerpoint.
reviews.comment_teaching:
I skipped most lesson and do my own stuff in class, no comment on the syllabus teaching.
But he is nice that whenever we have problem, he will guide us to think and provide informative advice.
reviews.comment_grading:
- Participation and peer evaluation 10%
TA will randomly pick some lesson to tick attendance, I have missed 3 to 4 times i guess.

- MBS game 30% (10% for each round: Model 3, 4A, 4B)
our class have 9 group and the first will get 10 marks. will deduct 0.1 mark base on your rank (e.g. lowest = 9.1)
our group 1 game scored above mean and 2 games got low

- Presentation 10%
our group get low. (mean: 9.1)
His standard is similar with Marketing course (e.g. the ppt style, can't look at script) After presentation will have Q&A (if no classmate hv question then he will ask it.) But it is nice that no report is required.

- Final Exam 50%
my score: 46.8/50 (mean: 42.1)
Open book, you can open the slides. It is unexpectedly easy that as long as you ctrl + F, and find the corresponding formula, you will get the answer. So everyone perform well.
around 6 short question and remaining are quantitative question (from MBS game + teaching content)

Final grade: A-
The range must be soooo narrow.
reviews.comment_workload: OK la, every week need to submit MBS game decision before class. may need to spend some time to discuss before lesson.

reviews.comment_teaching: Excellent teaching. Professor Ronald is humorous and easy-going. He reduces our workload as much as possible!
reviews.comment_grading:
Excellent Grading.
Participation and peer evaluation 10%
Everybody would be assigned for 6% baseline score.

MBS game 30%
3 rounds, group based
For each round:
1st get 10
2nd get 9.9
3rd get 9.8
So far and so forth. Even if you are the last, you still get 9.1

Presentation 10%
There are some topics, like SF express, Huawei, Li and Fung… all groups get 9-10 marks
Final Exam 50%
Open book, very easy
reviews.comment_workload: Very low. Just some decisions about the MBS game and the presentation.

reviews.author: 獨行俠
reviews.comment_content: The courses covered discussions of case study and a capsim simulation game.
reviews.comment_teaching:
The teacher is very kind but sometimes I find it difficult to understand what he meant. It seems he does not know the game very well so we have to learn on our own.

One other thing that I may not like the presentation when each group had to present for the whole class. It was a bit torturing for the presenting group and boring for the audience.
reviews.comment_grading:
It consist of essay questions asking the cases that the course has covered.

Although the questions were quite hard, the grading was better than expected/
reviews.comment_workload:
The simulation game is to run a company and earn as much as profit than companies which are other student groups.

The simulation game has taken quite a lot of effort and time since we need to make decision on a lot of department such as marketing, R&D, HR, and finance which have not been covered in the course. In order to play good, you need to have sufficient knowledge in related areas

For presentation, each student group is required to read one case and present it to the whole class. Preparation did take some time but not as much as the game.

reviews.author: penguin3220
reviews.title: A course of MonsoonSIM
reviews.comment_teaching: To be honest, his teaching (or maybe the content?) is quite boring , so it is hard to concentrate for the whole class (3 hours).
reviews.comment_grading:
Online quizzes with top-up option 10%
- There are 5 online quizzes in total. Each quiz carries 2% of the grade. The mean is around 1.6%

Pre-game planning and practices 10%
- Should be full marks for everyone as long as you finish it

Group competition games and review/analysis** 30%
- There are 3 games in total. Each game carries 10%

Group case presentation 10%
- Everyone got 8 to 9 marks out of 10 marks, does not make any differences

Final exam 40%

(Basically, the final exam and 3 of the MonsoonSIM games determine your grade)
